topics.title: Impedance Occurs
topics.description: Another issue, the big issue with impedance occurs down there, that region.
evidence_quotes: However another issue, the big issue with impedance occurs down there, that region.

topics.title: Information Loss
topics.description: The loss of information by one and the other won't be cancelled out.
evidence_quotes: But the information loss by one and the information loss by the other won't be cancelled out.

topics.title: Masquerading Distortion
topics.description: The hard distortion of your source, of your amplifier was masquerading, was masking the highest frequencies with distortion content.
evidence_quotes: And when I listen to lower level gear, and when you listen to them, and it seems, wow, this sounds really extended in the highs.

topics.title: Revelation
topics.description: Because most of that hard distortion is gone and you are able to hear high frequencies coming out from your loudspeaker.
evidence_quotes: in most cases you will experience this as a revelation.

topics.title: Taming Unruliness
topics.description: And in that if we tame it, then we don't just tame that unruliness of the speaker, but we also mitigate the fact that it does to the hard distortion coming from your amplifier.
evidence_quotes: And in that if we tame it, then we don't just tame that unruliness of the speaker, but we also mitigate the fact that it does to the hard distortion coming from your amplifier.
